name: Streadata.io API Gallery - National Snow and Ice Data Center
description: This is a repository of national snow and ice data center APIs, self-contained as a Github repository, with HTML and YAML representations of the APIs and their surrounding operations.

apis.name: National Snow and Ice Data Center
apis.description: NSIDC manages and distributes scientific data, creates tools for data access, supports data users, performs scientific research, and educates the public about the cryosphere.
apis.tags: National Snow and Ice Data Center
